    • getWord

      public String getWord(String specifier)
      This method will return the word at the specific specifier, randomizing the word that it selects from the list!
      Parameters:
      specifier - - This will be the specific type of word (noun, verb, adjective, adverb, preposition)
      Returns:
      - the word that will be used in the sentence.

    • tellStory

      public ArrayList<String> tellStory(int sentCount)
      This method will generate the senteces that will be displayed on the screen for the user!
      Parameters:
      sentenceCount - - Amount of sentences in the story, so we can use it for the loop.
      Returns:
      - The arrayList full of the sentences so we can print them.
